article: Ricky didn't help much around the house, so his parents bought him a butler robot. As soon as it arrived, off it went, cooking, cleaning, and gathering up dirty clothes from Ricky's bedroom _ . He told his parents that the butler was _ and asked them to have it _ . But his parents didn't believe him at all for they were _ with the butler for its good service. Ricky kept on telling them how much good stuff the butler was hiding, until one day the butler heard the boy's _ Then it returned some of the boy's toys and clothes to him. "Here, sir. You've been stealing my stuff for weeks!" the boy answered _ "The objects were left on the floor; _ I thought that you did not like them.
